name: app-store-connect
title: App Store Connect
description: Perform tasks from App Store Connect
author: johanthorell

commands.name: showApps
commands.title: Show apps
commands.description: Template with a plain detail view

commands.name: testFlightBuilds
commands.title: Show builds
commands.description: Template with a plain detail view

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
